.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SiteIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")]
[<System.Obsolete("Code Access Security is not supported or honored by the runtime.", DiagnosticId="SYSLIB0003", UrlFormat="https://aka.ms/dotnet-warnings/{0}")>]

summary.span: 为代码所源自的网站定义标识权限。

span.span: Defines the identity permission for the Web site from which the code originates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类可以确保调用方来自特定的网站。Using this class, it is possible to ensure that callers are from a specific Web site. 仅为 Url 中的代码和 HTTP、HTTPS 和 FTP 协议定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是 URL 协议后面的 "//" 之间的字符串和以下 "/" （如果存在，例如， `www.fourthcoffee.com` url 中的） `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm` 。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, `www.fourthcoffee.com` in the URL `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm`. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 URL 为 `http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/` ，则该站点为 `www.fourthcoffee.com` ，而不是 `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000` 。If a given URL is `http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/`, the site is `www.fourthcoffee.com`, not `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000`. 站点可以精确匹配，也可以通过通配符 ( " \* " ) 前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 `*.fourthcoffee.com` 匹配 `fourthcoffee.com` 和 `www.fourthcoffee.com` 。For example, the site name string `*.fourthcoffee.com` matches `fourthcoffee.com` as well as `www.fourthcoffee.com`. 如果没有通配符，则站点名称必须是精确匹配。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站点名称字符串 \* 将匹配任何站点，但不会与没有站点证据的代码匹配。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，对标识权限的要求有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任的。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不满足要求的条件，则标识权限的请求会失败。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，如果调用程序集具有完全信任，则标识权限要求将无效。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这将确保所有权限的一致性，从而不会将标识权限视为一种特殊情况。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 在之前 .NET Framework 版本中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，你可以使用 方法来防止无意中通过受信任代码访问系统资源。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并且现在仅由为程序集授予的权限集确定对资源的访问权限。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并仅向该代码允许访问的资源分配权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅 [如何：在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox). > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，标识权限不能具有 权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着在2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限与实现该接口的权限具有相同的行为 。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的完全限制状态 不匹配任何站点。The fully restricted state of matches no sites. 包含此构造函数是为了与其他权限的设计保持一致，但在实践中并不有用。This constructor is included for consistency with the design of other permissions, but is not useful in practice. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，标识权限不能具有 权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着在2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限与实现该接口的权限具有相同的行为 。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是说，如果程序集已被授予完全信任，则标识的请求始终会成功，无论程序集的标识如何都是如此。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，对标识权限的要求有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任的。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不满足要求的条件，则标识权限的请求会失败。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，如果调用程序集具有完全信任，则标识权限要求将无效。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这将确保所有权限的一致性，从而不会将标识权限视为一种特殊情况。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.

exception.span: 参数不是 的有效值。

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，以表示指定的站点标识。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to represent the specified site identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为 Url 中的代码和 HTTP、HTTPS 和 FTP 协议定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是 URL 协议后面的 "//" 之间的字符串和以下 "/" （如果存在，例如， `www.fourthcoffee.com` url 中的） `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/` 。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, `www.fourthcoffee.com` in the URL `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/`. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 URL 为 `http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/` ，则该站点为 `www.fourthcoffee.com` ，而不是 `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000` 。If a given URL is `http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/`, the site is `www.fourthcoffee.com`, not `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000`. 站点可以精确匹配，也可以通过通配符 ( " \* " ) 前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 `*.fourthcoffee.com` 匹配 `fourthcoffee.com` 和 `www.fourthcoffee.com` 。For example, the site name string `*.fourthcoffee.com` matches `fourthcoffee.com` as well as `www.fourthcoffee.com`. 如果没有通配符，则站点名称必须是精确匹配。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.

exception.span: 参数不是有效的字符串，或与有效的通配符站点名称不匹配。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid string, or does not match a valid wildcard site name.

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本表示对资源的相同访问权限，或者与原始权限相同的站点标识。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources or the same site identity as the original permission.

Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述它们共同描述的站点的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the sites they both describe in common. 只有同时传递两个原始权限的请求才会传递交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 例如，表示访问权限的权限与表示访问权限的权限的交集 `www.fourthcoffee.com` `*.fourthcoffee.com` 是表示对的访问权限的权限 `www.fourthcoffee.com` 。For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to `www.fourthcoffee.com` and one that represents access to `*.fourthcoffee.com` is a permission that represents access to `www.fourthcoffee.com`. 两个相同站点标识权限的交集是相同的权限。The intersection of two identical site identity permissions is the same permission. 两个不同的 (不是通配符) 表达式的交集是空的权限。The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission. 通配符表达式和匹配站点的交集是站点。The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching site is the site. 两个匹配的通配符表达式的交集是两个表达式中更长、更具体的。The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定了完全包含在指定权限中的站点，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a site that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 下表显示 当前权限的值范围和指定权限的的值。The following table shows the value of for a range of values of the current permission and the specified permission. |当前权限Current Permission|指定的权限Specified Permission|IsSubsetOfIsSubsetOf| |------------------------|--------------------------|----------------| |`www.fourthcoffee.com`|`www.fourthcoffee.com`|`true`| |`www.fourthcoffee.com`|`www.tailspintoys.com`|`false`| |`www.fourthcoffee.com`|`*.fourthcoffee.com`|`true`| |`www.fourthcoffee.com`|`*.com`|`true`| |`*.fourthcoffee.com`|`www.fourthcoffee.com`|`false`| |`*.fourthcoffee.com`|`*.fourthcoffee.com`|`true`| |`*.fourthcoffee.com`|`*.com`|`true`| |除以外的任何内容 `None`Anything except `None`|`*`|`true`| |`None`|任何内容Anything|`true`|

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Site { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Site : string with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the current site.
The current site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为 Url 中的代码和 HTTP、HTTPS 和 FTP 协议定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是 URL 协议后面的 "//" 之间的字符串和以下 "/" （如果存在，例如， `www.fourthcoffee.com` url 中的） `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/` 。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, `www.fourthcoffee.com` in the URL `http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/`. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 URL 为 `http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/` ，则该站点为 `www.fourthcoffee.com` ，而不是 `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000` 。If a given URL is `http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/`, the site is `www.fourthcoffee.com`, not `www.fourthcoffee.com:8000`. 站点可以精确匹配，也可以通过通配符 ( " \* " ) 前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 `*.fourthcoffee.com` 匹配 `fourthcoffee.com` 和 `www.fourthcoffee.com` 。For example, the site name string `*.fourthcoffee.com` matches `fourthcoffee.com` as well as `www.fourthcoffee.com`. 如果没有通配符，则站点名称必须是精确匹配。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站点名称字符串 \* 将匹配任何站点，但不会与没有站点证据的代码匹配。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence.

exception.span: 无法检索站点标识，因为它的标识不明确。

span.span: The site identity cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.

returns.span: 权限的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

span.span: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果 是一个权限，它表示当前权限和指定权限所表示的所有站点。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the sites represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何传递任意权限的需求都将传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 例如，表示对的权限以及表示访问权限的权限的联合 `www.fourthcoffee.com` 是表示对的 `*.fourthcoffee.com` 访问权限的权限 `*.fourthcoffee.com` 。For example, the union of a permission that represents access to `www.fourthcoffee.com` and one that represents access to `*.fourthcoffee.com` is a permission that represents access to `*.fourthcoffee.com`. 权限的并集 `null` 是不是的权限 `null` 。The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`. 权限和权限子集的联合是包含子集的权限。The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the subset. 任何其他组合会导致 引发。Any other combination results in an being thrown. 例如，站点标识 `www.fourthcoffee.com` 和站点标识的联合将 `www.tailspintoys.com` 导致异常，因为两者都不是另一个的子集。For example, the union of the site identity `www.fourthcoffee.com` and the site identity `www.tailspintoys.com` results in an exception because neither is a subset of the other.

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
-or-

exception.span: 权限不相等且其中一个不是另一个的子集。

span.span: The permissions are not equal and one is not a subset of the other.
